typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\n\n     \n      [active]\n      ,[back_color]\n      ,[ciid]\n      ,[created]\n      ,[created_computer_name]\n      ,[creator_guid]\n      ,[deleted]\n      ,[deleted_computer_name]\n      ,[deleted_date]\n      ,[deleted_user_guid]\n      ,[fore_color]\n      ,[guid]\n      ,[guid_changed_date]\n      ,[m_guid]\n      ,[modified]\n      ,[modified_computer_name]\n      ,[modifier_guid]\n      ,[name]\n      \n  FROM [dbo].[dm_appointment_category]\n\n\n\n\n\n   ',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceLAG
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT\n\n     \n      [active]\n      ,[back_color]\n      ,[ciid]\n      ,[created]\n      ,[created_computer_name]\n      ,[creator_guid]\n      ,[deleted]\n      ,[deleted_computer_name]\n      ,[deleted_date]\n      ,[deleted_user_guid]\n      ,[fore_color]\n      ,[guid]\n      ,[guid_changed_date]\n      ,[m_guid]\n      ,[modified]\n      ,[modified_computer_name]\n      ,[modifier_guid]\n      ,[name]\n      \n  FROM [dbo].[dm_appointment_category]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceABJ
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT\n\n   \n      [active]\n      ,[back_color]\n      ,[ciid]\n      ,[created]\n      ,[created_computer_name]\n      ,[creator_guid]\n      ,[deleted]\n      ,[deleted_computer_name]\n      ,[deleted_date]\n      ,[deleted_user_guid]\n      ,[fore_color]\n      ,[guid]\n      ,[guid_changed_date]\n      ,[m_guid]\n      ,[modified]\n      ,[modified_computer_name]\n      ,[modifier_guid]\n      ,[name]\n      \n  FROM [dbo].[dm_appointment_category]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcePH
sourceLAG derive(fertility_location = abs(1)) ~> CreateLocation
sourceABJ derive(fertility_location = abs(2)) ~> DerivedColumn1
sourcePH derive(fertility_location = abs(3)) ~> DerivedColumn2
CreateLocation, DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		guid as string,
		m_guid as string,
		creator_guid as string,
		created as timestamp,
		modifier_guid as string,
		modified as timestamp,
		deleted as boolean,
		rowversion as binary,
		ciid as integer,
		patient_nr as string,
		title as string,
		familyname as string,
		firstname as string,
		firstnames2 as string,
		nameaffix as string,
		birthname as string,
		housename as string,
		default_address as string,
		street_private as string,
		region_private as string,
		zip_private as string,
		town_private as string,
		street_business as string,
		region_business as string,
		zip_business as string,
		town_business as string,
		street_other as string,
		region_other as string,
		zip_other as string,
		town_other as string,
		tel_mobile as string,
		tel_business as string,
		tel_business2 as string,
		tel_private as string,
		tel_other as string,
		fax_business as string,
		fax_private as string,
		email_business as string,
		email_private as string,
		www_business as string,
		www_private as string,
		jobtitle as string,
		birthdate as timestamp,
		assurance_nr as string,
		member_nr as string,
		assurance_category as integer,
		recipe_charge_free as integer,
		recipe_charge_free_to as timestamp,
		letter_salutation as string,
		letter_greeting as string,
		assurance_extra as string,
		bank_name as string,
		bank_account_nr as string,
		bank_nr as string,
		bank_iban as string,
		bank_swift as string,
		ewr_nr as string,
		ewr_ass_nr as string,
		extra_assurance_ambulant as boolean,
		extra_assurance_stationary as boolean,
		memo as string,
		dwa_guid as string,
		partner_guid as string,
		employer_guid as string,
		assured_by_guid as string,
		ewr_expiry_date as timestamp,
		foreign_import_id as string,
		religion as string,
		donor as boolean,
		donor_id as string,
		donor_medical_history_guid as string,
		account_no_financial_accounting as string,
		country_private_guid as string,
		country_business_guid as string,
		country_other_guid as string,
		birthplace_country_guid as string,
		nationality_guid as string,
		patient_no_external as string,
		tax_number as string,
		birthplace_region as string,
		birthplace_zip as string,
		birthplace_town as string,
		ambulance_number as string,
		ignore_on_export as integer,
		health_insurance as string,
		health_insurance_branch as string,
		salutation_expression_guid as string,
		salutation_guid as string,
		voucher_discount as decimal(18,0),
		voucher_discount_per_position as decimal(18,0),
		voucher_due_days as integer,
		voucher_assured_address as integer,
		gender_guid as string,
		correspondence_language_guid as string,
		insurance_guid as string,
		family_status_guid as string,
		voucher_period as integer,
		voucher_currency_guid as string,
		insured_by_relationship_guid as string,
		occupation_guid as string,
		inactive as boolean,
		linked_patient_guid as string,
		deleted_date as timestamp,
		deleted_user_guid as string,
		assurance_category_guid as string,
		turn_off_reminders as boolean,
		street_invoice as string,
		region_invoice as string,
		zip_invoice as string,
		town_invoice as string,
		country_invoice_guid as string,
		contact_guid as string,
		do_not_send_sms as boolean,
		responsible_person_title as string,
		responsible_person_salutation_guid as string,
		responsible_person_familyname as string,
		responsible_person_firstname as string,
		responsible_person_street as string,
		responsible_person_region as string,
		responsible_person_zip as string,
		responsible_person_town as string,
		responsible_person_country_guid as string,
		responsible_person_tel_mobile as string,
		responsible_person_email as string,
		responsible_person_tel as string,
		responsible_person_fax as string,
		responsible_person_gender_guid as string,
		responsible_person_birthdate as timestamp,
		translator_title as string,
		translator_salutation_guid as string,
		translator_familyname as string,
		translator_firstname as string,
		translator_street as string,
		translator_region as string,
		translator_zip as string,
		translator_town as string,
		translator_country_guid as string,
		translator_tel_mobile as string,
		translator_email as string,
		translator_tel as string,
		translator_fax as string,
		translator_gender_guid as string,
		translator_birthdate as timestamp,
		is_test as boolean,
		postposed_title as string,
		responsible_person_postposed_title as string,
		translator_postposed_title as string,
		home_visit as boolean,
		created_computer_name as string,
		modified_computer_name as string,
		deleted_computer_name as string,
		patient_key_word as string,
		reminder_lock as boolean,
		reminder_lock_remarks as string,
		reminder_lock_till_date as timestamp,
		do_not_send_email as boolean,
		dunning_lock as boolean,
		dunning_lock_reason as string,
		guid_changed_date as timestamp,
		accounting_authority_export_rejected as boolean,
		translator_patient_guid as string,
		responsible_person_patient_guid as string,
		responsible_person_type_guid as string,
		deactivation_remark as string,
		fertility_location as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
